actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1610.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12355 to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12355 (Nuclear Regulatory Commission appropriations authorization).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12355 to authorize appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended, and for other purposes.
